body.p: Dear Friend I have just received a line from home the Devils are committing all kinds of devilment -- I leave on the 3 oclock train -- I leave all the papers with you for God and our countries sake get from the Governor authority for me to raise men to expell these fiends from our land we are forty miles from any Union troops -- I can rais sufficient men to exterminate these theives and traitors do any thing get a commission to rais a regiment a brigade a company any authority to rais even a company either as State Guards nine months men -- any kind of a rais so I can act, if the Governor does not do it we are lost -- as I told you a price is set on my head -- they may get it I would rather live but am not a fraid to loose my life in this cause but will try to make these hill hound pay for yelping on my trail

I am your old
friend Ira Stout
Direct an answer to me at Hawsvill Hancock Co Ky in haste

Re Oct 27/62
Issd 29th will write again --
The Gov will please read & consider this letter with the other papers handed him
